## Contract Details
----------------------

Canada is seeking proposals from interested Offerors to rent or lease a Firefighting Vehicle / Apparatus that can be utilized as a primary backup response for all suppression and rescue incidents occurring at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax and Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Bedford. Bid documents are available in English and French.

The Offeror must be able to provide the necessary equipment and personnel to ensure the effective operation and maintenance of the fire truck.

The Offeror will be required to provide a comprehensive operation and maintenance plan to ensure the continual reliability of the equipment. Regular maintenance work and scheduling requirements must be outlined in the proposal.
